title: White and dark chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['85g (3 oz) margarine', '85g (3 oz) caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', 'a few drops vanilla extract', '170g (6 oz) self-raising flour', '50g (2 oz) chocolate chips (or plain chocolate, chopped)', '50g (2 oz) white chocolate chips (or white chocolate, chopped)']
